items.title: SF to open COVID-19 testing site for SFUSD students and staff
items.summary: SF is partnering with SFUSD to open a COVID-19 testing site at Crocker Amazon sports complex in the Excelsior District with 150 tests per day for SFUSD students and staff starting October 5.

items.title: SF prepares vaccination plans for children under age 12 and booster doses
items.summary: A joint statement from the San Francisco Department of Public Health, Dignity Health, Sutter Health, UCSF, Chinese Hospital, and Kaiser Permanente.

items.title: Data shows SF children are safe in schools
items.summary: SFDPH is monitoring COVID-19 cases among children and in schools and is providing critical public health resources to SF communities.

items.title: SF Emergency Operations Center urges continued vigilance ahead of Labor Day weekend with ongoing COVID-19 and wildfire threat
items.summary: While 80 percent of San Francisco’s eligible population is fully vaccinated against COVID-19, we encourage our community to remain vigilant during Labor Day weekend and the coming weeks as we continue to navigate the current virus surge.
